Reviews.Title: “Worth every penny!”

Reviews.Content: wife visited istanbul december 2011 honeymoon trip time extravagant started search junejuly internet narrowed 45 hotels finally called star deluxe balcony bosphorus view season rate choice rate compare hotels appropriate deluxe proper lighting cupboards electric plugs curtains balcony table view amazing bathroom clean shower system buffet breakfast served everyday 7 10 am huge variety choose menu fixed throughout 10 day trip hotel staff vast 23 days friendly approachable hotel location taksim near taksim square hardly 5 minutes walk main subway system huge advantage considering taxi rates lot cheap restaurants proximity cafe istiklal 3 mins hotel huge huge advantage night 8pm sightseeing istanbul drawbacks hotel staff friendly comprehend english obstacle normal routine cleaned day noticed 3 days stopped providing bath towels bathroom slippers maybe ran water washbasin lukewarm hot liked shower didnt bathroom walls thin hear neighbours toilet im heard expecting cupboard safebox passports money safe staff hotel sometimes service slow courteous wasnt issue hotel pretty upbeat shops money changers little costly compared sultanahmet advice tourists fun book hotel deluxe hot happening istiklal street proximity system staff friendly service visit turkey definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “did not live up to expectations”
Reviews.Author: Alexa888
Reviews.Content: chose hotel reasons looked decent location ideal roof bar offered panoramic views city rooftop bar closed double offered tiny single bed dressed double pillows fit bed flatly refused shown reasonable fairly items minibar date staff tried helpful communicate english ability assist limited notice cleaned thoroughly neatly arranged wed slept day received email ahead trip offering assistance replied parking spaces didnt answer email arrange airport pick id call ahead confirm location hotel taksim square close bars restaurants tram line local shops

Reviews.Title: “Special location but not a special hotel”
Reviews.Author: Guven
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights october booked biggest travel sites web avoid nasty surprises arrival originally car par tall city according information web site hotel car park swayed decision car told car par undergoing refurbishment closed didnt believe story anyway park carpark hotel door extra cost web site mentioned swimming pool gym seen hotel didnt bother checking overall neither pleased nor disappointed hear taksim relatively tidy clean dont expect space luxury stay istanbul comfortable accommodation surrounded bars restaurants offer fooddrinks reasonable prices hotel pay bit upgrade size hotel unfortunately term boutique hotel widely turkey usually means hotel inadequate facilities

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: Edita V
Reviews.Content: sister aunt mom visited istanbul october booked hotel internet 3 star hotel didt expect pleasantly surprised location hotel perfect taksim square perfect shopping street love shopping hotel clean staff stay istanbul special hoped friendly staff enjoy stay istanbul dont speak english understand talk thats recommend hotel personally wanna thank ilkay drove airport shift taxi didnt pick definitely thank guys greetings norway

Reviews.Title: “Very good Hotel, location & Friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: 501 breathtaking view bosphorus weve booked months advance price attractive spacious bathrobes safe provided bathtub fan bathroom fine spending 3 days istanbul didnt time television sitting balcony stay enjoy kingsize double bed comfortable bed available storing clothes wifi fine password entrance card day reception desk change caused bit inconvenience saturday night disco door bit noise didnt disturb local tea strong kept awake half night breakfasts tiny breakfast included fruit 3rd didnt provide sufficient amount tea coffee fruit location hotel excellent close taksim square tram metro bus taksim square goes directly airport convenient feel satisfied excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good hotel. They only need the "petit plus"”

Reviews.Content: 5night stay star hotel location simply excellent steps taksim square istiklal street wherever foot youre hungry street walk 50 mts youll plenty cheap options eat id recommend stay city sultanahmet nice day night lonely theres left totally renovated 2nd floor werent bothered street noise night clubs near hotel people feel bit suggest chairs tables guests space luggage regarding breakfast served form 7 10 am morning 930 am food slices bread olives yoghurt sausages eggs tray empty refilled refilling buffet breakfast closing time morning 8 am plenty options bread ham cheese cereal eggs sausages etc breakfast wait 10 minutes standing plates hands table sit bad tables occupied people staff didnt help reorganize people fit table clean suggest staff breakfast organizing table sitting apart details breakfast nice stay top floor beautiful pictures closed restaurant isnt roof restaurant thanks pleasant stay

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel march 2010 4 mates fussy staying wife etc nighclub door floor nightclub cotton wool ears didnt help friends 2nd floor didnt experience beware 102 quiet nights sleep overalll standard hygiene istanbul illustrated downstairs staircase breakfast leads toilet lucky sit near staircase poor breakfast isnt accompanied gentle waft urine hotel absolutely please avoid irish pub james irish sell grand dont sell guinness absolute joke avoided
